briefdescription.para: This is a handle to the low-level node managed by Autodesk.Max
Creates a node attached to a particular scene object.
Creates a named node attached to a particular scene object.
Use this Method to filter objects with Editable_Poly and Editable_Mesh class

detaileddescription.para: param: baseObject TODO check base of object (allow to work bellow modifiers)
param: modPolyOrMesh TODO check modifier of object (editable_poy and editable_mesh modifiers)

briefdescription.para: Represents a node in the scene graph. Wraps a INode class in the 3ds Max SDK. Nodes cannot be created unless they are associated with an object.
